name: 5 mins walk from Newton subway
description:
I have 3 bedrooms in a charming British style townhouse for you and your family while you are visiting Singapore . This is the GREEN ROOM .
https://www.airbnb.co.uk/rooms/294281
Be sure to look at the other 2 rooms .

BURGUNDY ROOM(https://www.airbnb.co.uk/rooms/369141 )
BLUE ROOM (https://www.airbnb.co.uk/rooms/369145)

The space
A cosy spacious room with own patio/balcony facing a nice park . A charming British style townhouse

Amazing location in the heart of the City. You cannot get anywhere more convenient; ten minutes to all entertainment, shopping hub of the 'infamous' Orchard Road.

Five mins walking to gym,supermarket, banks food places and restaurants

Beauty of it all is that is it nestled in a very quiet street with a nice park surrounded by lots of greenery.
Fantastic newly renovated kitchen so if you enjoy cooking we can whip up a storm.

Terms : Daily Rate @ AUS $68

name: Cozy Blue Room with large window!
description:
The space

The 3 greatest statement in our home.

My rooms are all kept to high standard & clean . We request the same standard to be achieved during departure and will welcome you back anytime you need it again.

This room is furnished with single room and sleeps 1 person.

You are welcome to use the kitchen, the living room and the laundry at any time.

The Bathrooms are shared for all guests.

description:
A unit for all foreign students in a homestay environment

It's s 4 bedroom home with lots of fun and exchanges of stories

The space
Quick access to NTU, SMU, NUS INSEAD, CBD area, Orchard road etc for both exchange students or working interns.

Most of our guest are interns working in multi national companies, so it's a great opportunity to meet people from all walks of life. Especially good to meet young international interns who love going on short weekend getaways :)

Great Location, Great guests, Great Host.

The 3 GREAT statements about our home!

My rooms are all kept to a high standard & are very clean. We request the same standard to be kept during your stay and before departure. If so, we welcome all guests again to stay.

name: Heritage Apartment Room near Orchard
description:
A basic simple small room for solo traveler in a heart of Singapore's central area- with easy access to buses and MRT train- Located in a heritage district.

The space
Experience staying in Singapore's Straits Peranakan conserved unit with modern amenities.

The unit is part of a 3-storeys shop-house and an exclusive 33 - boutique apartment complex, with separate different units. This is the ground floor with a front porch and a backyard. The land title was from the British Colonial's 19th century (1841) of 999 years, and the original building was built before the World War. It has been renovated and retrofitted in 2011 with modern amenities while keeping the outside preserved.

It is suitable for a solo traveler, single traveler whom needs place to crash after exploring Singapore, or transiting to other destination.

Please note this is a small study place converted to guest room. Amenities in the room:
- This is a bright study

name: Master Bedroom in Newly Built Flat
description:
Aircon Master Bedroom in a Newly Built Flat for Lease from 18 APRIL 2015 (6months to 2years) directly opposite Temasek Polytechnic.

The space
Aircon Master Bedroom in a Newly Built Flat for Lease from 18 APRIL 2015 (6months to 2years)

Furnished Master Bedroom for rent in TAMPINES (Aircon, queen-sized bed, wardrobe, desk, side table, TV, fan) with attached bathroom. Rental from S$1300 per month including utilities (depending on number of pax in room).

Very bright and windy on 8th floor in Tampines with utilities, washer, internet and light cooking okay. The room is available for LONG/SHORT TERM (at least 6 months’ lease). Preference to let room to maximum 2pax in room or SINGLE LADIES or STUDENTS (no pets, no-smoking).

NOTE: Security Deposit of 1 month's rent is required.

The flat has wireless internet, washing machine and kitchen has all cooking utensils. Light cooking allowed but tenants must provide own grocerie

name: Ensuite room, pool, near airport, expo and sutd.
description:
Cosy, spacious double room in a quiet and pleasant neighborhood. Wi-fi, tv. Big common pool and gym. 12 min. walk to suburban mall and MRT station. Also near Expo and SUTD, both about 20 min. walk. Especially great for lady travellers.

The space
Bright and spacious ensuite double room in a quiet neighbourhood. Bed is queen size.

Guest access
TV, Wi-Fi in room. Tea/ coffee, bread and butter in the pantry. Washer/ dryer is available but try not to wash everyday ok?

While simple toast is fine, no gas cooking please. Lots of food places near MRT Station and suburban mall, 10 min. walk away. Food-courts, cafes, fast-food, etc. Perhaps try local food during your short stay here? Singapore is quite known for its streets food.

By the way, I live in the house. You will have own bedroom and bathroom. You will have access to living area and pantry.

And you will have access to common external facilities such as pool

name: BEST CITY LIVING WITH GA RESIDENCE
description:
The space
LEADING PROVIDER OF PREMIUM ROOM ACCOMODATION IN SINGAPORE. FOR THOSE WHO NEED AT LEAST 6 MONTHS ACCOMODATION AND FIND HOTEL/SERVICE APARTMENTS TOO COSTLY. EVERY BEDROOM OFFERS A PARANOMIC VIEW OF THE CITYSCAPE, AND CLEAR VIEW OF THE SKYLINE.

ALL YOU EVER NEED TO DO IS JUST CHECK-IN, AND FEEL THE COMFORT OF "HOME" WHILE BEING AWAY FROM HOME.

The house is run by a group of Catholics but open to all. We have a prayer room that is open to those who want to spend some time in quiet reflection and prayer. Above all, we seek to provide a safe, friendly and cosy environment for students.

The space

There is a place where you can find your purpose, discover who you are and have a whole lot of fun with new friends who speak your language.

Guest access
A prayer chapel for quiet reading, meditation and a place to think and reflect yet near enough to the city centre to connect with family and friends. Want to learn how to bake bread, pick up another language, play the piano or guitar, climb a mountain or paint a portrait of yourself, - possibilities are endless at the Secret Gardens 5:00am where sun, air, water and a good night's sleep all conspire tog

There is a small pantry with water boiler, a micro wave, and microwave safe cups and bowls and a small fridge. There are common individual toilets and showers for sharing. The

name: Explore Serangoon!
description:
Convenient and located in a quiet neighbourhood. Has direct buses to the city centre and nearby shopping malls.

Big enough to accommodate you and your travel companion with ease and comfort.

The space
Located in a quiet neighbourhood where local delights are available nearby.

Come an experience the local culture of Singaporeans and get to enjoy the serenity at the same time.

Huge shopping mall just 5 - 10 mins away by walking and accessible to two train lines just 5-10 mins away.

Privacy offered and you may even get to try my cooking if you are lucky :)

Cable TV is available downstairs in the living room
Bathroom is attached to the room.

Two Twin sized beds available for use

Guest access
Almost all spaces are available for usage but please respect the things that I have on display.

Other things to note
One room can accommodate 2 pax

name: Cozy 1BR condo 20min to downtown!
description:
Enjoy our safe, 2015 renovated apartment situated in western Singapore.
- Amenities eg. Swimming pools, jacuzzi, playgrounds, wi-fi
- Keycard entry, strict security controls
- Walk to Buona Vista MRT/Star Vista mall in 8min/Holland Village in 15min!
- Min 3 months rental

The space
Cozy, safe, light-filled apartment.
Located on the ground floor, one can enjoy a beer in the patio with a view of people playing tennis.
We have a queen-size real bed in the bedroom. There are TVs in both the living room and bedroom. Wi-Fi and cable TV are available at no extra cost
Due to local laws, we prefer long-term guests as short-term stays are not allowed

Guest access
Guests can choose to cook in our renovated kitchen.
Washer and dryer facilities with detergent provided.
Wi-Fi connection provided.
Enjoy condominium facilities such as swimming pools, jacuzzi, children's playgrounds.

name: New Studio Apartment near to city
description:
Fully furnished 350 sq feet beautiful studio in the city fringe.

The space
-City fringe living at walking distance/ 1 stop from 2 MRT stations (i.e. Boon Kang & Patong Pasir MRT less than 5 minutes’ walk away)! Only 2 stops to city (i.e. Dhoby Ghaut MRT)!
-Great privacy as you have entire studio apartment to yourself! No sharing with strangers!
- Bedroom with open kitchenette (including microwave, stove & washing machine) plus attached spacious bathroom.
- Queen size bed with Mattress & pillows.
- 2 Seater dining table.
- Quaint neighbourhood with good eateries around so you will never go hungry!
- Lap pool and mini gym on top floor (work out then eat then work out - healthy living i suppose :))
- Point of cultural exchange with Little India and Not-to-miss-everything-can-get-cheap Mustafa Centre, plus numerous wonderful Indian curries within walking distance! - Experience a lil bit of old S'pore before full effects of global

name: Nice 2+1BR condo next to MRT, Insead, NUH, Sentosa
description: Dover Parkview. 5min to Buona Vista MRT (Green/Circle subway lines). Spacious, cozy, equipped with swimming pool, gym, parking. Many restaurants, bars, local hawkers nearby, eg Star Vista mall, Rochester Mall, Holland Village. Friendly district: NUH, NUS, INSEAD, Metropolis, Fusionopolis, Biopolis, next door.

name: Not available
description:
Full condo facilities, live in maid service with laundry and cooking. Fibre wifi. Starhub cable. Non-smoking with a balcony.

The space
Newly installed Daikin Aircon. En suite marble bathtub.

Guest access
Wifi, computer, phone and printer with office supplies available. Daily live in Maid service. Free laundry. Access to kitchen and living room and all condo facilities. There is also a cat.

name: Queensway Cozy Room, Convenient with Nice View! 4
description:
A cozy single room in a private shared apartment situated above Queensway Shopping Centre! Perfect for Interns/Short Term Stay to Singapore

Beautiful views outside of natural tropical forest treetops, with the convenience of city living!

Plenty of Food Options around! Amenities a plenty!

The space
Cozy Relaxing Room in the outskirts of the city with a double bunk bed and basic furnishings.

The apartment is shared and has a feeling of a high end dorm. However privacy is ensured, and there are only friendly flat mates to assist you should you need to know anything about the surrounding area.

Guest access
Kitchen, Bathrooms, Laundry Area

Other things to note
- The apartment has a total of 5 rooms
- Highspeed 1GB wifi!
- Daily Cleaning provided to common areas within apartment

name: Lakeside En-suit/Master room.
description:
Condo Name : Parkview Mansion
Location : Japanese Garden,
4 bustop to Lakeside MRT. Bustop right in front of the gate.
The room is very nice cosy and quiet.
We provide Pillow, blank & bedsheet. There is air conditioning.
Photos are taken by Airbnb photographer ;)

I can plan your trip and/or show you around SG whenever I'm free.
Within walking distance, there are swimming pool and gym which cost only a few dollars.

Available from Oct

Due to URA policy, minimal stay if 3 months is needed

name: Master bedroom with pool view
description:
Conveniently located within 7 minutes walk from MRT Aljunied (500 m). Vibrant area during night & day, with many amenities & eatery shops.
Bus stop just around the corner, taking you directly to Raffles Hotel, Bugis...
Quiet & comfortable master bedroom (20 m2) facing the swimming pool. Kingsize bed with ensuite bathroom. (No sharing with other people).
Recent condo with full facilities, swimming-pool & gym.
Guests can access living area + windy balcony, kitchen (micro-wave), laundry facilities.

The space
Master bedroom with ensuite bathroom, facing the swimming pool. Guests have access to the living-area, to the windy balcony and to the kitchen, also to the laundry facilities.
I provide basics (corn flakes, bread, butter, jam, fruit juice) for breakfast for the first days until the guests are acquainted with the neighbouring shops, and, of course, tea and coffee throughout the stay.
Towels (2 for each guest) plus 1 for swimming-pool

name: Green Space
description: Rare combination of modern living, greeneries and convenience.  The room has internal private bathroom.  Newly renovated apartment, with beautiful living room.  Laundry machine & dryer. Near MRT, malls, food stores, supermarket.  Free extra beds.

description: Beautiful balinese loft with new and solid exquisite furnitures. 42in smart TV and hi speed wifi inclusive. Complimentery Weekly cleaning provided . 5 min walk to Farrer Park MRT and amenities . Near downtown and shopping area.

It is a private room, small, simple, clean and air-conditioned. It has a bunk or loft bed for ONLY 3 persons, a small wall table shelf, a ceiling light and a reading light. Each room may or may not have a window or TV set, subject to availability.

It has a space of at least 2m x 3m. It may have a window or a TV set. The bed type is usually a 2-decker bed. However, at times, it may be different. All requests are subject to availability. The picture is only a sample.

name: Cozy Penthouse Room
description:
Cozy room in a two level penthouse with excellent views of the Singapore skyline from its floor to ceiling windows. The room has its own dedicated bathroom (toilet and and shower). The condominium has full facilities including a lap pool, gym and tennis courts.

The space
The room has a single bed, a desk and chair, drawers for clothes and a small closet. There is also a ceiling fan and air conditioning.

Guest access

Other things to note
The bed has sheets, a cover and a pillow. Toilet paper is provided; other amenities such as towels and soap are available upon request.

Quaint room in Queensway in a private apartment above Queensway Shopping Centre! Super convenient!

High speed wifi, free utilities all included, pay and stay!

5 mins by cab to Sentosa, Orchard Rd, Clarke Quay etc.

Perfect also for students who want a quick commute from schools such as MDIS, NUS, NYU, Kaaplan etc.

name: Central Location, Near MRT & Food. Long Term Rent.
description:
Wake up to bird calls on a high floor of a Kallang apartment. Canal view. Window, queen size-bed, desk and office chair, wardrobe, kitchen, dining table. Shared toilet & shower. Long term stay welcome (6 months onwards). Please inquire first.

The space
Fresh bath towel, face towel, bedsheets, blanket, pillows provided. Complimentary teabags and coffee sachets. The room will be cleaned and sanitised for your health and comfort. We love nature and seek to conserve energy and the environment, so do observe little things like switching off lights and air con, practice recycling by placing recyclables (glass, paper, plastic bottles, aluminium cans) in the box provided in the kitchen. We provide re-usable shopping bags for your use, and a glass jug of water with glass (not plastic) bottles to drink from.

Kallang is located in Central South Singapore, and is convenient to get to town. The nearest mass rapid transport (MRT) station is Kallang MRT, alight ther

name: Private room in Katong (near town)
description:
Landed property with decor of olden days, private room furbished with 2 table, 2 wardrobes, 2 bed with sheets and 2 chairs. Room is equipped with air-conditioning and fan. Windows had added curtains if you do not like the sun. Quiet and quaint room in the east, just 20 mins away from orchard road.

The space
Oriental house that is rarely seen around Singapore as compared to modern apartments and condominiums will be an experience!

Guest access
Guests are able to access, the living room, kitchen and dining table

Other things to note

- Room serves 2, maximum 3

name: #Spacious Ensuite@Jurong East [LONG-TERM]
description:
The vantage room is spacious and clean, with private shower room.
High floor enjoys the natural cooling breeze all day without the need for aircon.

Access to Superfast WIFI, modern kitchen, laundry machine

It's a spacious en-suite room with airconditioning

The space
It's a spacious 3 bedroom apartment.

Only my dad lives here, occupying one of the common rooms and sometimes my family may visit him.

Another common room is currently occupied by a friend; she is friendly, tidy and doesn't make noise, who's a working professional without much time at home.

It's cool even in the summertime due to its location and high floor. Most times we can cope without airconditioning.

It is not modernly refurbished, to be honest; but it's easy to fall in love with this place. Your room is equipped with everything you will need: a standard double bed, wardrobe, and a desk with a mirror, a single sofa chair,

name: 3 bedroom apt beside Kembangan MRT.
description:
Fully furnished 3 bedroom apartment in a safe and quiet housing estate. A short 3 mins walk to the Kembangan MRT station and only 4 stops away from Changi Airport station. 15 mins train ride to town (Orchard). There are many local delicacy around our neighbourhood.

3间房间，在很安全和舒适的地区。3分钟就能走到地铁站，4个站就能到樟宜机场。15分钟就能到乌节路。1分钟可以走去便利商店。

Guest access
Ideal for families, this apartment has 3 bedroom, kitchen and a living room. There are 2 bathrooms and 1 toilet.

Terms and conditions.
- 2 pax is entitled to 1 room. If you intend to stay in separate rooms (2 rooms), an additional fee $50 / night will be charged.
-3 pax is entitled to 2 rooms. If you intend to stay in separate rooms (3 rooms), an additional fee $50 / night will be charged.
-4 pax is entitled to 2 rooms. If you intend to stay in separate rooms (3 rooms), an additional fee $50 / night will be charged.

name: Heritage Collection on Seah Loft
description:
Centrally located in City Hall, this apartment is a stone's throw away from City Hall, Bugis and Esplanade MRT Stations. Great for business and leisure travellers looking for a convenient location!

Apartment size: Approximately 155 sqft

Booking policy: The booking is strictly non-amendable.

The space
This is a newly renovated loft type space. Fully furnished with modern and luxurious fittings. It is a self-contained apartment with the bed on an upper loft deck, separated from the living space for additional privacy. There is a fully equipped kitchenette ideal for light cooking. The bathroom comes equipped with European rain shower for a spa-like experience! There is also an Apple TV or Cable TV connected to the TV for guest's enjoyment.

The photos used in the listing is of a sample apartment in the building, and may not be a reflect the actual apartment that will be allocated subjected to availability. The allocated apartment may

name: Chateau Le Fame near ACS, SCGS, NUS (Bukit Timah)
description:
Condo is in a quiet neighborhood for a good night's rest, yet only a stone's throw from key attractions. Take a short walk to the Botanic Gardens, S'pore's World Heritage site. Shop at the vibrant Orchard Road which is less than 10min away.

Within 1km of ACS Primary School and Singapore Chinese Girls School. Within 2km of SJI and ACS Junior School

Min. 3 months stay

The space
The entire apartment is available for you, along with the pool. The estate is guarded by 24 hour security

Guest access
Free access to pool

Other things to note
Free wifi
Free parking

Our Ezspace Team would like to host all guests.There are total 8 rooms in this big landed house. EZS Global offers fully furnished corporate housing solutions for expat accommodation in Singapore. They are located within walking distance. Free housekeeping/laundry services are provided.

Long term guests come first !

The space
The house is about five minutes walking distance from Kembangan MRT station which is three stops away from Singapore Expo; four stops to Changi Airport; five stops to Lavender MRT where the ICA (Immigration and Checkpoint Authority) building is situated; six stops to Bugis which is one of the shopping and entertainment hot spot in Singapore, not to mention the famous Arab street nearby; seven stops to City Hall and the central of our little island. Furthermore, it is 2.3 kilometers to East Coast Park, one of the most esteemed running and sports venue, through Siglap park Connector. A great place for beach lovers and sports enthusi

description:
A cosy home for a quiet and peaceful stay, with a wide balcony area. Only 5 minutes walk to Upper Changi MRT/train station and 10 mins to Airport. Walking distance to Changi Business Park, Singapore Expo, the new SUTD University and SIA Training Centre.

The space

Guest access

美丽优雅与主床房

Beautifully furnished & spacious Master-bed room with attached bathroom. With jacuzzi, swimming pools etc. 20 mins from airport. 30 mins from Sembawang MRT to Orchard MRT.

The space
It is a beautiful resort. The bedroom is on the 3rd floor of a terrace house, accessible by wooden stairs, with its own bathroom and toilets.
It's furnished with a wooden bed & built-in wardrobe.
The flooring is made of exotic wood.
The bathroom is simple, with its own toilets, and large shower. The floor and walls are covered with Ceramic tiles.
Kitchen is on the first floor, but it's not for public. However there is a fridge that can be used to store some food, if needed.

Guest access
Internet, wifi, swimming pools etc.

description:

and * washer & dryer. It can be configured with an extra mattress for 3 pax, and of course, house keeping , wifi, and 24 hour reception.

The space

name: Private Room for 7pax @ Chinatown
description:
Our hostel is close to Chinatown. You’ll love Wink because of the Chinatown neighbourhood, it is merely 2 minutes away from the subway yet it is just 1 street away from the noise of the bustling Pagoda Street. You can rest assured of our high standard of cleanliness throughout, our comfy capsule-type beds. Privacy and security are ensured with our keycard access to your room and locker. Wink is ideal for couples, solo adventurers, business travellers, groups and families.

The space
Each custom-made pod is uniquely put together with unmatched features:
· Custom-designed and spacious
· Sound resistant walls in-between pods
· Dedicated ambient backlight that turns on automatically to guide you to your assigned pods, without disturbing others
· Adjustable reading LED light for your glare-free reading pleasure
· Cushy back-rest
· Power socket to charge your gadgets and accessories
· Side-ledge and hook for your personal effects

The space

Transportation details in photos.

We use the app for the: meeting people and giving tips for what is best in the welcoming Singapore where we live.

Any special requirements?! : accessibility or work till early morning, or any other unusual request, please let us know before booking.

I'm a easy-going person, love to meet new people and host travellers!

Located in the heart of Singapore's most sort after conservation estate Tiong Bahru. Centrally located and access to great food, nice cafe, bars and convenient transport.

1070 sqft of comfort living during your stay in Singapore.

description:
Super high flr above 50th. Stunning marina bay view/Sea view. Better than marina bay sands. Premium 1 bedrm unit beautifully furnish. Separate hall/room with a small kitchen area. No washer machine in the apt. Avail 7 Feb onwards. Book fast!

The space
Has a separate living area from the big spacious room.
Ideal for a short to mid term stay. Suitable for those looking for a unit with stunning view Marina bay to appreciate the best view in Singapore
Washing machine not available but can be arranged for pick up by laundry co at yr cost

Guest access
anywhere within the apt.
full access to condo facilities. some facilities require booking deposit eg bbq

Other things to note
1) treat the apt as yr own
Respect the apt and take care of the things there

Tastefully furnished executive master bedroom, king-size bed, balcony area, aircon. Suitable for professional on business trip. Office facilities, fax, photocopying and wifi available.

The space

2. Parking and office desk area with computer and printer for visitors on business trip.

3. Connect with nature and view different species of birds and squirrels

The executive master bedroom is about 50 sq ft with aircon and ceiling fan and mini fridge. Maximum occupancy for this room is 2 persons. Bathroom and toilet is shared

Other things to note

- Airport transfers and transport to MRT and place of interest can be arranged

Great place for shopping and site seeing, 5 mins walk City Square mall, 24hrs Mustafa shopping center, Farrer Park hospital, Little India market, Hindu & Buddhist temples. Local food/ coffee shops, restaurants, modern cafes, traditional shops are at the door step.

The space
Private room (with door key lock) with attached bathroom in the Shared apartment, solely meant for guests' use. Room has its own private bathroom, built in closets, mini fridge, queen size bed, TV, Air Condition, Wi-Fi and a queen bed that can accommodate 2 people.

Other things to note
1. No Housekeeping service; however it can be arranged at $10 with 1 day advance notice.
2. There is no kitchen or cooking facilities.
3. Bedroom#1 (in the photos) is facing the street therefore there could be bit of street noise.
4. The apartment is on the

description: Near to the Circle line which brings you to Marina Bay area. Direct bus to town. Eating and supermarket within walking distance. School and community centre just next door. Hipster cafes around the corner

name: Chinatown: In the Heart of the City
description:
High floor, un-obstructive view towards City
• One of the most convenience and vibrant places in Singapore.
• 2 MRT lines: NE line and Downtown line at your doorstep.
• Marina Bay Sand/Sentosa/Clark Quay/Little India within mins.

The space
Your room is fully equipped and very cozzzy.
Clean and boiled drinkable water is provided at all time.
Free coffee/tea is also provided.
I understand how tired and exhausted after exploring and discovering Singapore.
So it's important, you need a nice and comfortable bed to lie down and get that energy back next day.

Guest access
The little 'pantry' is accessible for you to use the microwave oven or toaster.

Other things to note
Always travel light to fully enjoy your stay.
Don't drag that heavy suitcase or luggage.
You can come by Taxi or MRT (Metro).
By taxi cost about $25 and the trip is about 20 mins.
By MRT the cost is $2.5

name: Room w Attached Bathroom; 200m to MRT Station
description:
Suitable for professional man or male student who likes to stay around the North Eastern Region of Singapore. Punggol is near to Seletar Aerospace Park, Changi Business Park and 20 mins train ride to Singapore city centre. Punggol is also a tranquil residential area that allows you to enjoy the refreshing and scenic waterway park with convenient amenities around.

The private bedroom comes with an attached bathroom and Smart TV, for your complete privacy and entertainment.

The space
Book this place if you want convenient transportation to the city centre (23 mins train ride) via Mass Rapid Transit, MRT (Singapore's version of subway, metro) or a tranquil suburban life near the waterway park in Singapore, where you can jog around and enjoy the spectacular scenery of the waterway.

Guest access
- Recreational Pool
- Club house (Gym, Reading Room)
- 50m lap pool
- Jacuzzi pool
- Hydro Gym Stations
- Free wifi

name: Nice and cozzy room without window.
description:
As your host, I will gladly assist you whatever you requested and do my best to guide you in order that you enjoy your holidays in Singapore. The apartment is neat and clean ensuring a very pleasant stay.
The location! Simply awesome.

Other things to note
You can come by Taxi or MRT (Metro).
By taxi cost about $25 and the trip is about 20 mins.
By MRT the cost is $2.50 and 45 mins.
Depending on what time you arrive, without dragging any large luggage hopefully, I suggest MRT because it's cheaper, save you money and provide a sight- seeing tour on the elevated track before arriving at Chinatown MRT.
Backpack and travelling light is the best as most essential are already provided in your room.
If you are coming by MRT, board the MRT at Terminal 2 or 3 and you can easily figure out how to reach here. There are plenty of signboard prominently displayed at the stations.
Best bet is changed at Bugis MRT station.
Board the Downt

description:

The space
Located centrally just outside Central Business District of Singapore along Lavender Street, {Dream Lodge} is housed in a 1950's era shop house surrounded by 3 MRT stations (One opening in 2017). The location offers quick access to the heart of everything which Singapore have to offer.

Just outside our door step, you will find Hip Cafes, Local Delights, Cultural & Historical Places, Shopping Centres all within 10mins walk. This district is filled with backpackers lodges for some great reasons.

Guest access

- reading lights
- 2 pillows

description:
Centrally located 10 min walk from both Newton and Novena MRTs, the apartment is a rare low-rise gem with a Mediterranean look and feel, decorated with some nice art pieces.

Located on a quiet residential street with green surrounds. There's also a pool and jacuzzi to chill out in.

The room itself comes fully furnished (including bedding) with its own private bathroom and ensuite balcony.

Not for SHN

Guest access
Walking distance to Newton and Novena MRTs.

description:
Very bright apartment with 2 bedrooms facing the swimmingpool (1 king-size bedroom with ensuite bathroom and 1 queen-size bedroom with separate bathroom), fully equiped kitchen.

Longer stays preferred.

Conveniently located within 7 minutes walk from MRT Aljunied (530 m) or Dakota (550 m).

24/7 Condo security.

The space
Entire aparment, facing the swimming pool. Enjoy the facilities (swimming pool and 24/7 gym), living-area, the windy balcony and the kitchen, also to the private laundry facilities.

I provide basics (corn flakes, bread, butter, jam, fruit juice) for breakfast for the first days until the guests are acquainted with the neighbouring shops, and, of course, tea and coffee throughout the stay.

Towels (2 for each guest) plus 1 for swimming-pool are also provided.

Guest access
MRT (underground): Aljunied only 500m (7 minutes walk).

description:
Perfect for traveling couples who prefer a more private setting and yet happy to meet other fellow travelers.

Each bunk bed is fitted with new 8 inch spring mattress, international power points, shelf, night lamp and a large locker.

The space
Housed in a chirpy art deco heritage building, Beary Best! was conceived with the simple intent to merge backpackers practicality with hotel like facilities and comfort.

With 3 large floor space, the building features a large lounge area for interactions with other travelers, airy dorms and hallways, pantry area and even a little outdoor patio.

Our building is located just 1 minute away from the Chinatown MRT Exit E & F.

Guest access
* Free Coffee and Tea all day

name: Couple Pods....Right outside the City!
description:

The space
Extensive research and interviews with backpackers allow us to provide you with a wide range of services/facilities that will make your stay with us a pleasant and memoriable one. {Dreamlodge} being equip means you will spend less time solving lodging problems and increase the time touring around Singapore.

The pods/capsules are designed to give you comfort and extra space unlike traditional capsule hostels which is designed to maximise land use.

Bring your Dreams and stay with us for the night to feel the difference.

Guest access

Guest access

Washing machine, detergent and laundry rack is provided for guests.

description:

There are 10 beds in each dorm. Each bunk bed is fitted with new 8 inch spring mattress, power points, shelf, night lamp and a large locker.

Contact us if you need more than one bed.

The space

With 3 large floor space, the building features a large lounge area for interactions with other travelers, airy dorms and hallways, pantry area and even a little outdoor patio.

Our building is located just 1 minute away from the Chinatown MRT Exit E & F.

G4 Station is only 2 mins away from Little India MRT Station.

The space

name: Clean & spacious room for rental
Queen Capsule for 2 (Free Breakfast)
description:
7 Wonders Hostel at Jalan Besar, we aim to create an accommodation and atmosphere where we bring people from all walks of life, nationality and culture together. Travel and sleep at an affordable price yet get to experience a luxurious stay-over at our shared room capsules, with breakfast included in all our packages. We are located in the heart of numerous historic attraction of Singapore in an extremely characteristic and lively area within short 5 mins walking distance to the famous Mustafa.

The space
Our queen capsule fits 2 persons comfortably with 4 pillows, complimentary towels upon check-in, accompanied by personal lockers that can fit only cabin size luggage and privacy curtains. Reservation rate includes free breakfast daily. 24/7 free wireless and computer available at common space for guests. Kindly take note that this is a dormitory or sharing room and not a private room with shared toilet and bath.

Guest access
GUEST CHECK-IN:

name: Single Capsule For 1
description:

It aims to provide a classy environment within a backpackers staying hostel.

The space
Our single capsule fits 1 comfortably. with 2 pillows, 1 towel(rent),
accompanied by personal lockers and privacy curtains.Our cafe provides free breakfast and live stream for football. 24/7 free wireless and 2 computers available at common space for guests. Each bed comes with privacy curtain, personal locker, towels, welcome drink.

We are flexible with our check-in prior notice of 2 days. We have a non check-in period from 11.00AM to 2PM.

Guest access

My place is close to restaurants and dining, public transport, and family-friendly activities. You’ll love my place because of location, environment, ambiance, people. My place is good for solo adventurers and business travellers.

This room is only available for at least 6 months stay.

Other things to note
No consumption of beef in the entire house due to religion reasons

name: Chinatown Single No window
description:
Located at the heart of Chinatown, this apartment is a stone's throw away from Chinatown and Telok Ayer MRT which gives you endless things to see, do and eat. Newly renovated and fully furnished, that you can easily identify our apartment from the specially commissioned Heritage mural on the building facade.
Ideal for our solo travellers who spend most of the time exploring the city and want to come home to a fully furnished and self-contained accommodation.

The space
Booking policy: The booking is strictly non-amendable.

Fully furnished with modern fittings with no windows but brightly lit with lamp. There is a fully equipped kitchenette ideal for light cooking. The bathroom comes equipped with European rain shower for a spa-like experience!

The photos used in the listing is of a sample apartment in the building, and may not be a reflect the actual apartment that will be allocated subjected to availability. There are 2 types of design

name: Newton -few minutes from Orchard Road
description:
A cosy charming British townhouse with 3 color themed rooms for your group and family
You can book one room or all 3 rooms
Nestled in the heart of the city - near Train Stations and Bus stops taking you to all parts of Singapore yet surrounded by greenery and a park with exercise equipment etc
Few minutes walk from infamous "Orchard Road " where restaurants , shopping malls , entertainment, and night life.are located.
Good for couples, individuals, families and business travelers

name: Spacious Master Room - Terrace House
description: My place is close to parks and restaurants and dining. You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the cosiness, the high ceilings, and the views. My place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travellers. 20 minutes to airport. 3 bus stops to Aerospace Hub, about 10 bus stops to Yio Chu Kang Industrial area - Apple Computer, Motorola, Seagate, ST Technologies...  Next to TPE, Aerospace Hub   3minutes walk to Thanggam LRT   Mobile: 98580204 Minimum 6 months stay!

name: Simple and cosy room in quiet neighbourhood
description:
My place is only good for female solo travelers.

You’ll love my place for the beautiful quaint neighbourhood and its location. Our house is perfectly located for getting to know central Singapore and all its sights. It is a quiet neighbourhood with many restaurants, parks and activities around. The excellent transport links also make our house ideal, whether you are here for business or leisure. I stay in this house together with my family and dog.

The space
Please note, the room does not come with an ensuite bathroom. There is a shared bathroom right outside your room with heating. You are welcome to use all public areas which include:

1. Amenities: 5G Wi-Fi available
2. Kitchen: A fully equipped kitchen with dishwasher, washing machine, kettle, oven, toaster and coffee machine. Feel free to use all crockery and utensils but kindly wash up after yourself :)
3. Dining/living area/private patio: You’ll most likely be joined by ou

name: Cozy room in Newton
description:
I have 3 bedrooms in a charming British style townhouse for you and your family while you are visiting Singapore . This is the BLUE ROOM . (https://www.airbnb.co.uk/rooms/369145)

The space
Amazing location in the heart of the City- 10mins walk from the infamous "Orchard road "where all the shopping hub and restaurants are located

Walking Distance to Orchard Road , Little India, Indian Heritage Centre

Indian Heritage Centre , Trishaw Ride @ Bugis , Stamford Arts Centre, Newton Hawkers Centre-One of the first food courts in Singapore

name: Common Rm nr Expo/SUTD/CBP/Airport/Boeing (72C1)
description:
Comfortable spacious Townhouse w open concept kitchen. Within walking distance to Changi Business Park, Expo MRT (Metro), Simei MRT (Metro), SUTD and SIA Training Centre. 5 mins walk to 24hrs 7-11 convenience store. 10 mins walk to a mall with restaurants, food center, 24hrs supermarket.

Location recommended for Professionals. For expats coming to work at CBP, this would be a desirable location for you as well. Within 10 - 15 mins walk to CBP area.

*Rental of 3 months and above only

The space
Spacious house at quiet area, great for working and resting. Opposite SUTD (Singapore 4th University, Changi business park, SIA Training Centre and Singapore Expo.

Residents can get to nearby supermarkets (e.g. NTUC Fairprice XTRA) and shopping mall (e.g. Changi City Point) within the area for an array of amenities such as grocery and retail shopping, banks, eateries and more. Alternatively, you may also go to Eastpoint Mall located at Simei

name: FAMILY SUITE FOR 10 (Free Breakfast)
description:
Our charming, classy capsule hostel in the hip Jalan Besar neighbourhood is the perfect place to rest and relax while exploring the exciting area of Little India as it is situated on a calm, and lively with many awesome eateries all around us.

Family Suite for 10 accommodates up to 10 guests. It consists of 6 single capsules and 2 queen capsules.

The space
Our private or family rooms inspired of Japan capsule concept featuring complimentary high-speed WiFi access in the entire hostel, secured with digital lock, numerous shared toilets and bathrooms situated in every level which includes toiletries such as 2 in 1 body soap/shampoo, hot water shower and free towels upon check-in. Reservation rate includes free breakfast daily. Lift or Elevator access available towards the rooms and computer at the common area for guests use. Kindly take note rooms are with shared toilet and bath with no private toilet and bath inside the room.

Short term stay in public and private residences is banned in Singapore. This apartment is neither a public nor a private residence. It is a commercial shophouse.

TripleOne is a fully furnished, air-conditioned apartment in Woodlands. It has 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms for 6 persons. It is near to shops, restaurants and MRT station. It is ideal for those who want to experience living like a local in an affordable and convenient HDB estate, the successful public housing project in Singapore.

The space

In addition to the comfortable beds, each bedroom comes with a wardrobe, a study table and a chair. A maximum of 6 persons can live in the apartment very comfortably.

name: Prime Loft Apt in the heart of Orchard Road
description:
My serviced apartment is located in the heart of Orchard Road, right next to the subway station and major shopping malls. Featuring high ceilings and bay windows, the loft comes with a lounge area and fully-equipped kitchenette. Each also has a cable/satellite TV, personal safe, free WiFi and ironing facilities.

The space
For well-heeled couples or business travellers looking for a accommodation, our one-bedroom serviced apartment is the trendy option for loft-style living in Singapore. With its high ceilings and bay windows, our 1 bedroom loft is the definite choice for the hip and chic.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire apartment, property facilities and the following will be provided:

• TV with cable channels
• High speed wireless internet
• Fully equipped kitchen
• The apartment is professionally cleaned after each guest.
• Housekeeping is provided Mon to Sat except Public Holidays

name: Central MRT Shopping Mall Condo Resort (Single)
description:
Late check out offer!

Beautiful place, with a lovely host that cleans the place daily! We have received feedback that we are the cleanest airbnb hosts around. The luxury condominium is situated just one zebra crossing away from Tiong Bahru Plaza Shopping Centre & Tiong Bahru MRT. 3 months rental

The space
After a Long term rental, we are back live again! The condo is conveniently next to Tiong Bahru Department store where there's a taxi stand, NTUC grocery, restaurants and food court. There's also a wet market and NTUC 24-hour behind the condo.

You may use any kitchen appliances for light cooking or baking. There's a filter on the tap for drinking.

***There are TWO washroom toilets for you to use. One in the kitchen and another for personal or shared use! :)

The host is Sandra as seen in profile pictures, she is a hospitable Singaporean middle aged lady. Wi-Fi included. ;)

name: Private Room for 2pax @ Chinatown
description:
Housed in a three-storey historic shophouse with a Chinese baroque facade, Wink exudes charm and local flavors. It resides in the must-see cultural enclave of Chinatown and is a convenient pivot to access Singapore’s attractions.

Within minutes northward lies Clarke Quay, a premium nightlife destination to unwind. In the South lies Marina Bay Sands and the distinctive CBD skyline.

And best of all… the Chinatown’s train station and several bus-stops are a mere 3-minutes’ stroll from Wink.

The space

· Custom-designed and spacious
· Sound resistant walls in-between rooms
· 40-inch wall-mount flat screen with movies at your fingertips.

Due to the health and convenience of our valued guests, we are unable to allow smoking, or pets anywhere in the house.

name: PREMIUM 1-BED WITH SKYLINE VIEWS, CBD.
description:
Wake up to the magnificent views of the business district and South China Sea from your full-height bedroom windows, these beautiful & spacious 1-bedroom apartment comes with all amenities and services.

The space
These apartments are designed for the sophisticated individual who dares to be different and desires a pad in the city. Available within two towers and on higher floors to give you a panoramic views of the city skyline.

Spread into 450 sq.ft, these apartments comes with living & dining space, equipped kitchen, master bedroom and en-suite washroom.

• Air-conditioning with individual thermostat control
• High speed WIFI
• Complimentary TV Channels
• Fully equipped kitchen with refrigerator, cooker and hood, microwave oven, electric kettle
• Washer and dryer
• Steam iron and ironing board
• 24-hour security and CCTV surveillance system
• Card proximity security system
• Once a week housekeeping

name: Studio Amaze~Cozy Serviced Apartment with WIFI
description:
Our apartment is ideal for couples, business travellers, solo adventurers, digital nomads and corporate clients.

This Amaze2 studio apartment is located in the East side of Singapore near the CBD. Going to the Orchard Road or Clarke Quay is only a few minutes away.

Our property allows you to do a pre-arrival check-in and straight to room with our igloohome digital lock.

The space
This studio unit will be your private home in Singapore. It comes with a queen size bed (150cm x 190cm) ~ fits a couple (2 pax) with some space to move around. The apartment is fully air-conditioned and has a solid WiFi internet connection for your personal and business needs.

We have our own team of trusted housekeepers who'll do the housekeeping for you three times a week. We will also be supplying you with fresh towels and toilet paper during the housekeeping. We change the bed linen once a week.

And as most guests would ask, there is

name: Luxury apartment few mins walk to Orchard Rd!
description:
Please note that this is a shared stay. My wife and myself stay in this apartment with our helper and our 2 year old son. We can offer 1 bedroom with en suite bathroom to 2 guests. The apartment is a 5 minute walk to Somerset MRT station and Orchard Road. Plenty of shops and restaurants surrounding us. We do not allow cooking of meals however heating up of food and using the microwave is not a problem.

The space
Our apartment is well furnished with 4 bedrooms and 4 bathrooms.
My wife and myself are a young couple who occupy the master bedroom (4th bedroom) with our own en suite bathroom. We have a toddler who is the most beautiful thing ever. We have sleep trained him but on some occasions at night he may cry. We are very happy to share advice and provide tips to ensure a happy stay in Singapore.

We can accommodate 2 people and can provide 1 bedroom with your own en-suite bathroom. Strictly no more than 2 people as we do want to maintain an exclu

name: Stylish 1 BR apartment near MRT & City Centre
description:

Ideal location for foodies looking for some of the best authentic Singaporean fare- 8 min walk to Old Airport Road Food Centre. Many other eateries offering local delicacies along nearby Geylang Road.

The space

6.9km to Marina Bay Sands (15 mins)
4.2km to Singapore Indoor stadium (10 mins)
5.1km to Bugis Junction (10 mins)
5.2km to Suntec City (10 mins)
9.9km to Orchard Road (18 mins)

name: Near Jurong east MRT new condo  room
description:
This common bedroom is in 3 bedroom apartment ( two common bedroom and one master bedroom). The apartment is equipped with a living room area, a fully equipped kitchen, a public bathroom (share for the two common rooms) and a public balcony. Free WiFi and weekly housekeeping are included

The space
This apartment also comes with full condominum facilities including sky gardens, swimming pool, gymnasium, sky dining pavilions and a tennis court.
The condo is located next to Jurong East MRT station which connects both the East-West Line and North-South Line. Residents can also walk to bus interchange in 5mins from the condo.
The apartment is also close to five big shopping malls. You will enjoy close access to one-of-a-kind shopping and dining experiences, and unmatched proximity to entertainment areas, including:
JEM, WESTGATE, BIG BOX, IMM (which is the largest outlet mall in Singapore)

It is at 6 mins walking distance from Aljunied MRT Station and takes 3 MRT stops (7mins) to Bugis Street and within 15-20mins to major attractions, shopping districts, Little India, China Town, Orchard Road, Boat Quay, and Clerk Quay & Marina Bay etc.

Each room is able to host 3 adults. There is no kitchen/cooking facilities. Electric kettle, Washing machine & dryer is available for guest use.

There’s a shared lobby pantry area for sitting and mingling after work, it's a nice outdoor area for a beer after the hot weather cool off!

name: Cozy Deluxe Private Room either Twin or Queen
description:
The space
Located at the crossroads of Ethnic Little India the Arab Street, the China Town and famous shopping belt of Orchard Road. The hotel offers comforts at a fraction of money compared to big brand hotels. The hotel is easily accessible by bus, car, taxi and train - 10-minute walk from Bugis MRT Station and Parco Bugis Junction Mall. Its central location enables hotel guests to move around the city with ease and comfort. Dunlop street is a happening place.Targeted at savvy singles, couples & families who want to walk and talk the Singapore experience A range of international cuisine eating joints , music lounges, arcades, beauty, massage parlors and many famous shopping centers are walking distance away.

A cosy and comfortable place to stay!

Only street parking available.

$0.60 per 30 mins from 08.30am - 10.00pm ( Monday -Friday)

name: Cosy Studio Apartment 2 at Heritage Tiong Bahru
description:

Within 2 mins walk, you can enjoy all kinds of food cuisine. Must try the local foods at Tiong Bahru Market, Ah Chiang Porridge, Ting Heng Seafood, House of Peranakan Petit or cafe like Tiong Bahru Bakery, PS Cafe, Chapter 55, Forty Hand & Flock.....

The space
This walk out apartment is not only suitable for couple, friends but also for huge families and groups of people who need more than one room.

This studio which is the biggest studio (500sqf) in the apartment. It comes with 2 windows and wooden flooring.

name: Large 2-bedroom apartment in orchard near subway
description:
Our licensed serviced apartment is set in the heart of city. It is convenient, spacious and pet-friendly. (We do not accept staycation booking)

This 2-bedroom apartment floor area is 750 square feet (approx. 70 square meters), making it bigger than average guestroom size in Singapore. It offers insanely comfortable queen size mattress, dining area, working desk, private bathroom, complete with kitchenette and washer & dryer. It can be configured with an extra mattress for the third travellers.

The space
If you travel for business, we offer working space in the main lobby. If you travel with dog or cat, your pet is very welcome.

Here, during your stay, you can get a good workout in our gym. Be sure to pack enough sunscreen for sunbathing on pool deck. When night falls, you can relax and enjoy a scenic lookout in the roof garden.

name: EH3, Newly Renovated Orchard room@ Somerset MRT
description:
Min stay 90 days (URA legal compliant).
Emerald Hill is a conservation site located in the heart of the lion city. A former home to many members of the city-state's wealthy Peranakan community, many of its homes feature skillfully preserved Chinese Baroque architecture. A quaint little street just minutes away from Orchard Road, it serves as an interesting glimpse into Singapore's history right in the middle of the city’s largest shopping district.

The space
The humble abode maintains its historic Peranakan flavour with its cool green exterior, while holding true to a classic elegance throughout its interior. Newly renovated on March 2018, the impeccably clean and spacious room features a Queen Sized bed, a work table, fresh linens, towels and toiletries, all fully provided for. Also stocked with all the cookware, dishware, kitchen towels, and condiments, our kitchen is ready for you to whip up budget friendly meals when you are not out enjoying our fine loc

name: Deluxe King room on Victoria Street
description:
Located on Victoria Street & nestled amid various entertainment centers and tourist attractions, our hotel is perfect for both frequent and first-time visitors to Singapore. Popular points of interests that are within walking distance from the property include Singapore Art Museum, MINT Museum of Toys. With plenty of nearby bus routes and MRT stations such as Bras Basah, Raffles City and Esplanade.

The space
A good night’s sleep awaits you in our homey rooms and modern rooms. To ensure maximum comfort and convenience, each room is air conditioned and equipped with a TV, Wi-Fi, fresh linen and mineral water. Guest bathrooms also come complete with an amenities bag that contains toothbrushes, toothpaste, shampoo, soap, shower cap and cotton buds.
Other facilities that are available upon request include parking and shuttle bus service.

name: 2 Single Capsules - Mixed Dorm
description:
Quarters Hostel is designed with YOU in mind - plush pillows, duvet blankets, full aircon, international plug, Free Wifi & breakfast. Plus friendly staff & AWESOME location - Chinatown, Singapore River, night life, 2 train stations all within 10mins!

The space
We believe that Quarters is more than just spending a night on an affordable bed. It entails a warm fuzzy environment where people meet people – friendships are forged, lovers are made, relationships engaged and inspired. So… we’ve done the basics of comfy beds, friendly staffs, useful facilities, and an awesome location for Quarters… now all that’s lacking, really, is you!

Guest access
Shared bathrooms, common lounge area and a Mac computer are available for guest use.

Other things to note
We sincerely apologise that we are unable to accommodate kids.

An ideal neighbourhood for those who works in town areas but would like to enjoy a restful stay in a heartland neighbourhood with family, the Potong Pasir area has been increasingly popular and the reason is clear. The lovely neighbourhood is one of the oldest residential estate in Singapore which is laid back and very local. It may seem under developed at first glance, but this neighbourhood holds lots of local history and has lots of neighbourhood quirks and interesting finds.

Other things to note
We like to make every one of our guests feel at home. To make your stay as comfortable as it can possibly be, let’s get the procedural duties done so that your stay will be fuss free! To abide by the Singapore rental law regulations, we seek your corporation to provide us a copy of passport/ IC and work pass( if any) to prove your valid stay in Singapore.

Pets are allowed at the apartment with additional charges:
• $10 per pet per day for Studio and 1B

The space

Each room is able to host 3 adults. There is no kitchen/cooking facilities. Electric kettle, Washing machine & dryer is available for guest use.

The apartment has beautiful hardwood floors, high ceilings with exposed beams and plenty of character.

name: Spacious room3 near MRT in the East
description:
Hi,

Welcome to our listing!

This is a rare newly renovated corner terrace at Joo Chiat, a residential conservation area in the eastern part of Singapore with rows of shop houses.

This is a spacious private room.

The space
Large private room of a large corner terrace house in the Eastern suburbs of Singapore. This property is only a 7 minutes walk from the nearest MRT station, Eunos which takes you to the airport or city in just 15 minutes. Connectivity is excellent with multiple bus connections island-wide. Also situated near the expat-favored area of Katong and East Coast, and 15 minutes away from the popular East Coast Beach - recreational activities like swimming, cycling, jogging, running etc are just a few steps away...

The entire property is two storey high with a large outdoor space like gardens for communal use. There is a large communal kitchen with fridge, microwave etc on the 1st storey. There are two communa

With our desire to make you feel at home away from home, the promised comfort and space in the suite will make you want to stay longer.

Stay with us for the one of the best living experiences Singapore has to offer.

The space

name: Chinatown - Luxury [Female Only] Queen Capsule
description:
The space
Want to have a deep and refreshing night’s sleep? CUBE Hotels feature a collection of comfortable capsules in shared or private rooms, each a cosy cocoon hidden from the outside world. Each capsule is designed with meticulous attention to detail. Our mattresses are super thick, and the linens are snuggly soft and plush. Not only are there several vital features available right inside your capsule, such as in-built universal plugs, and USB charger ports, but we’ve also added lights that dim, soundproofing, and air vents inside to create the ideal temperature. Come to CUBE for a sleep experience like none other.

Other things to note
Please take note: some of the capsules are shared (depending which type of beds you booked) and you will be sharing your room with other travellers. Want to have a deep and refreshing night’s sleep? CUBE Hotels feature a collection of comfortable capsules in shared or private rooms, each a cosy cocoon hidden from the outside world. Each capsule is designed with meticulous attention to detail. Our mattresses are super thick, and the linens are snuggly soft and plush. Not only are there several vital features available right inside your capsule, such as in-built universal plugs, and USB charger ports, but we’ve also added lights that dim, soundproofing, and air vents inside to create the ideal temperature. Come to CUBE for a sleep experience like none other.

Other things to note
Please take note: This is a private room and you would not be sharing the room with other guests. However, the bathroom is shared and is not located in the room.

name: Chinatown (2 Queen Beds) Family Boutique Hotel
description:
The space
Fitted with plush mattresses and linen, each capsule room is well designed to moderate its own temperature and air-flow; and solidly insulated to reduce ambient noise for a comfortable rest. Each capsule bunk is equipped with a universal electrical outlet protected with childproof adapter, room safe, mirror/vanity area, foldable table, bedside light and footwear storage. Each bunk bed is equipped with 32” smart TV sets with Netflix accessible to guests using their own passwords. There is ample storage space and a dressing table with mirror. Mini fridges with tea/coffee making facilities and bottled water are available. Sharp corners are considerately avoided for child safety while safety nets playfully surround the upper bunk.

Other things to note
Take Note: There is no elevator on the property.

Carefully restored from an art deco heritage building, we offer a calm, laid back and friendly environment.

Other things to note
Payment
* Payment by Credit Card or PayPal payments incur a 5% processing fee.
* A refundable security deposit of SGD 20 or equivalent in accepted foreign currencies per person is to be collected upon check-in, and returned upon an incident-free check-out.

Children policy
* Guest below 13 years old are not allowed at Beary Best! Kampong Glam Hostel.
* If you are traveling with children, please contact us as we have other accommodations more suitable for children.

Check-In / Check-Out Policies
This property has the following check-in and check-out times and policies.

name: Bright and Spacious Double Bedroom
description:
This is a private double bedroom in a terrace house located within a private estate.

Our humble place is designed to be cozy for our guests! This is a relatively quiet neighbourhood, away from the hustle and bustle of the city. Surrounded by greenery, it gives you a comfortable and serene living experience. We believe in adding that sense of personal touch to our hosting experience.

The space
If you love the idea of immersing yourself in a charming and quiet neighbourhood and live like a local during your stay in Singapore, this place is definitely for you! We are located 7-10 mins walk away from Lorong Chuan MRT Station. Nearby expressways will give you easy accessibility to Orchard Road, CBD and Marina Bay!

Guest access
Guests can access the kitchen for basic and light cooking. Cooking tools and utensils are provided.

Other things to note
I have two cats in my place, if you do not mind having a cat around

name: Capsule Family Room | Mins to Farrer Park MRT
description:
BEAT. Sports Hostel is a one of its kind sports-themed concept hostel with an in-house gym, a swimming pool in our backyard, and a dope basketball machine. The Capsule Family Room is unique because most capsules in Singapore are in huge non-private rooms. Here you can experience the capsules in a private room. Next to fun, we have a great love for food! And Jalan Besar is a food paradise - Swee Choon Dimsum, Tiramisu Hero, Chye Seng Huat, just to name a few.

The space
We are essentially a Backpackers Hostel, but we offer private rooms so that you can have the best of both worlds. So come, expecting to meet and interact with people, and yes our lounge can be used both as a place to relax, and to play some sports - it's free for our guests. (:

The space

name: F Your Loft in the heart of Singapore
description:
What you see is what you get.

Our location is very central and great for tourists. We are located on the fringe of Little India with all its culture and food.

We are very close to Singapore's famous shopping district, Orchard Road, just 4 subway stops away. The Farrer Park train station is just 4 minutes away

The neighborhood we are in has some of the best local food in Singapore like durians, bah-kut-teh (pork ribs soup), and prawn noodles. There are many cool cafes just minutes away.

The space
Even though we are centrally located, our surroundings are very peaceful and serene.

Given our proximity to the Central Business District in Singapore, it is also a great location for business travellers. We have fibre optic wifi covering the premises. None of our visitors have ever complained about wifi speeds.

We also provide fresh towels for all visitors. And depending on the length of stay, you can request for a

The impeccably clean and spacious room features a super-single bed, a work table, fresh linens, towels, spare toiletries, all fully provided for. Also stocked with all the cookware, dishware, kitchen towels, and condiments, our kitchen is ready for you to whip up budget friendly meals when you are not out enjoying our fine local restaurants. Fully equipped with Optic Fibre Internet, work and play has never been made this easy!

name: Cosy Common Room
Sweet Peranakan Studio. City/MRT/Netflix/Flexible
description:
This is a studio within a ground floor unit of an apartment in a nice and quiet residential area where the Farrer Park MRT is just 7 mins walk away. Within 5 mins walking radius, there are mini mart, 7 Eleven store convenience store, local hawker/market, trendy cafes and famous eateries like Ng Ah Sio and The Legendary Founder Bak Kut Teh.
There are also many well known Indian restaurants along Race Course Road, Banana Leaf...

The space
The studio is thoughtfully decorated with Peranakan accent.
Kitchen space:

It has a fitted kitchen with 2 gas stoves. Basic condiments are provided for simple cooking. There's a mini fridge. There is no dining table but it's fitted with dining counter with tall stools. A wall fan is there but actually not really needed as the place is pretty cool most of the time.

Room Space:
Its an air conditioned room fitted with very comfortable good quality Queen size bed.
Just installed a 43'' Sony

name: City-located studio loft apartment *BRAND NEW*
description:
Located at 371 Beach Road, the apartment is a three-minute walk from Nicoll Highway MRT, a ten-minute walk from Bugis MRT, and near the cultural and heritage district of Kampong Glam. It is strategically situated at the city fringe, near major hospital, Singapore Sports Hub, and Central Business District. The unique location offers the tranquility of suburban life, the vibrancy of culturally-rich Kampong Glam while still within close proximity to Downtown Core CBD.

The property is located at Little India area of Singapore, just 5 minutes walk from Farrer Park MRT Station. A cultural and bustling neighbourhood, there are plenty of amenities and services within walking distance, restaurants, supermarkets, shopping malls, amongst many other small and interesting boutiques. The property is also located a stone throw away from Farrer Park Hospital and 5 to 10 minutes drive away from KK Women and Children's Hospital.

The space
The modern and fully furnished 1 bedroom apartment is ideal for guests who'll like a relaxing stay with plenty of convenient amenities nearby. Markets, supermarkets, food centers, convenient stores and cultural hangouts are in abundance within walking distance of the apartment.

The apartment comes with a spacious living room, an open concept kitchen, bedroom with comfortable queen size bed, en-suite bathroom, and wardrobe.

name: All-new fully furnished Loft Studio in CBD w MRT
description:
Triple 2 Studio is a serviced apartment extended from a heritage building located on Cantonment Road and near 2 MRT stations (Tanjong Pagar and Outram Park). We offer a brand-new spaciously and well-lit designer ensuite studio Loft with housekeeping and amenities.

The space
We provide:

A) Free fibre optics WIFI
B) Weekly housekeeping, inclusive of towel (daily), bed sheet and pillow case change (weekly) (except weekends and public holidays)
C) Free local outgoing calls
D) In-room amenities (a safe deposit box, a mini-fridge, a microwave, a 50inch Smart TV, a hairdryer, an iron and ironing board, bathroom water heater, coffee and tea, bottled water, utensils, shampoo & shower gel, etc.)
E) Laundry facilities with fully automated Washer and Dryer (coin operated) in a common area
F) Small Gym room & roof top balcony/garden

name: Cozy room/Changi rise condo /Changi airport
description:
Hi there!
We are young couple no kid, both full time working in Singapore. We love travelling and like to meet all kinds of friends all over the world.
We just moved in this house last year which is newly renovated. We love our home, we like to share our happiness to the guests.

The space
The common room has separated bathroom and no need to share with us. So you have your own privacy.
The queen size bed can lift up as a sofa which provide more space during the day time. Swiming pool and gym are just downstairs.
The whole complex is like resort, quiet and green.
15 mins walk or 2 bus stops to Subway station and 24 hours supermarket, 7-11 in 5 mins walking distance. Vending machine in basement selling verything like toast, snacks and drinks.

Guest access
Swimming pool, gym, free car park.
Living room, kitchen, washing machine.

5. Best retail and edutainment options in the west: JEM, Westgate, IMM, JCube, Novena Furniture Mall, Jurong Library, Science Centre, Jurong Gardens and Jurong East Central shops

description:
Situated on the city’s prime shopping belt, minutes away from renowned shopping, dining and entertainment experiences. At day’s end, retreat to one of the stylish serviced apartments – designed with an array of well-rounded amenities for guests to work, live and unwind. Have the world at your fingertips with our contactless mobile services in our property app, take a dip in the rooftop swimming pool, recharge at the well-equipped gym, or enjoy an alfresco resting space in your private balcony.

105 Aljunied Crescent 380105, ($450 + ~$50 utility fee monthly) at an awesome location:

The space

I have 2 guitars and 1 piano too so we can jam together if you are also into music :)

We don't stay with the house owner (they are super nice and friendly, usually give us freebies and invite us out for dinner)

description:
Our charming, lovely Sturdee Shophouse on Sturdee Road in the hip Jalan Besar neighbourhood is the perfect place to rest and relax while exploring the exciting area of Little India as it is situated on a calm, and elegant residential street! ;)

Centrally-located to many awesome eateries, hawker centres, food streets & local bars/cafes, it is just a short 5min walk to Farrer Park MRT station. City Square Mall and the infamous 24-hour Mustafa Shopping Centre are also within a 5min stroll!

The space
*** Please Note ***: This listing is *NOT* for the entire shophouse, but for our self-contained studio -- it's located on the 3rd floor of the front wing, and is ONE of 5 private studios in our Shophouse :).

For those who enjoy neutrals and wood tones, Sturdee House is a delight. Probably dating to the 1950s, this Modern Shophouse Style uses concrete with no decorative tiles, presenting a more minimal facade.

Our peaceful serviced studios located 5-mins away from the bustling Orchard Road area in Singapore is a perfect for business travelers like yourself or a family vacation with your loved ones. Welcoming pets at the property, experience hotel-style services and amenities.

The space
You'll benefit from private and fully furnished apartments spread across 400sq.ft. including a fully fitted kitchen and dining table for self-catering and showing off your inner chef.

The residence’s sophisticated lounge area has complimentary Free Wi-Fi, enabling you to conduct informal meetings or catch up with some work outside of your apartment. A flat screen TV to kick back and relax after a long day. The bedrooms all come with a queen size bed and the finest linen that will have you recharged for the next day.

With a highly trained service team on hand at all times, comfort and convenience is at the heart of operations at the residence.

No Owner Staying

name: D'HOTEL Singapore - Executive Room
description:
D’Hotel is set in the midst of Tiong Bahru, a historic neighbourhood that was built in the 1930s. In recent years, it has undergone gentrification, resulting in the opening of a slew of chic cafes, art galleries and stores with easy access to Tiong Bahru, Outram Park and Chinatown MRT Stations in the vicinity.
D’Hotel offers 41 well-appointed rooms which are spacious, stylish and punctuated with bursts of floral and nature-inspired artwork.

description:

Bring your pet to join you during your stay at my place with pet levy of $15+ per pet per night. For more details, please feel free to reach out to me.

name: Lovely 3BR Apt in the Heart of Orchard Road
description:
The three-bedroom serviced apartment is perfect for bigger families or those who prefer a little more room looking to staying in the heart of Orchard Road. With 3 of the biggest malls and Orchard MRT right at your doorstep, it’ll be hard to find a more convenient location for your stay.

The space
If you’re travelling with a large group, the spacious three-bedroom is ideal for you. This vast apartment accommodates a family or group of friends comfortably, and the personal touches will soon have this place feeling like your home away from home.

Guest access
Guests will have access to the entire apartment, property facilities and the following will be provided:

• Light Continental Breakfast is provided from Monday to Friday, excluding Weekend and Local Public Holidays.
• TV with cable channels
• High speed wireless internet
• Fully equipped kitchen
• The apartment is professionally cleaned after each guest.

name: Only 5-10 min to Orchard Road
description:
This property is situated within 5 min of walking distance to Queenstown MRT. Closely amenities include Anchorage shopping mall, Ikea, Alexandra Food Centre. A 2 bedroom 2 bath apartment located at the city fringe, just 5-10 min to Orchard Road, a perfect homely and cozy place for holiday makers and professionals alike.

There's a 3 month minimum occupancy rate for this property due to government regulations.

description:
Located right in the centre of the shopping district, my serviced apartment is mere minutes away from major malls along Orchard Road. Each of our newly refurbished apartments is beautifully decorated to reflect Singapore’s urban living, while still remaining warm and inviting.

name: 2 Bedroom Apartment at Queenstown, Singapore

This unit has a floor area of 600 sq ft. It consists of a living and dining hall, kitchen, two bedrooms and one bathroom.

MONTHLY DISCOUNT AVAILABLE

name: Double Room, SHORT OVERNIGHT, 12 hours: 9PM-9AM
description:
Can’t find a hotel room elsewhere but need a roof over the head overnight? ST Signature can help solve this.
Book our private cabin with a fraction of what you paid elsewhere, you can now sleep peacefully and wake up feeling refreshed.

Staying at the end of Singapore but working overtime and need to be in office early the next morning? We are situated right in the CBD area. You can now save on cabfare and catch up with more sleep.

Luggage lockers (own padlock) are available at the premise for convenience.

Experience Singapore's first completely hypoallergenic rooms. Breathe easy with in-room ionizing air conditioning, a portable HEPA air purifier, breathable walls and allergy-friendly flooring and furnishings. These bright and airy rooms are bathed in natural light with views of central Singapore, punctuated with verdant greenery.

The space
One king bed or two twin beds, One rollaway or one crib. Extra beds are subject to availability. Extra charges may apply.

name: FOUR SEASONS HOTEL SINGAPORE, EXECUTIVE SUITE
description:
Host informal meetings at the dining table, entertain guests or take the night off – with room service and a movie – before closing the doors to the bedroom and drifting off to sleep.

The space
One king bed or two twin beds, One rollaway and one crib or two cribs. Extra Beds are subject to availability. Extra charges may apply. One full marble bathroom, plus guest powder room.

name: FOUR SEASONS HOTEL SINGAPORE, ONE BEDROOM SUITE
description:
Light fills nearly every corner of these ample suites, allowing you to wake with the morning sun in your bedroom, then you can watch the city light up at night from the living room’s picture window – or vice versa.

The space
One king bed, Two rollaways or two cribs. Extra Beds are subject to availability. Extra charges may apply. One full marble bathroom, plus shower room adjacent to the living area. Colonial-style doors and windows with plantation shutters; Sofa bed.

name: Double Room, SHORT OVERNIGHT, 12 hours: 7PM-7AM
description:
Suitable for travelers arriving in Singapore late in the evening and feel unjustified to pay extra hours from check-in time.

Now you can take advantage of this 12 hours time block to optimize your stay. Especially if you are here just to prepare for an important meeting the following morning, a good night sleep and somewhere in the central near your office is your ideal choice.

For locals, to stay out for the night may be a good break for some.

The space
The private cabin is equipped with one queen sized bed, suitable for 2 adults. In room amenities include bathroom, towels,TV, safe, vanity area and writing table with chair.

Rate is inclusive of wifi, bath amenities (dispenser) and complimentary usage of the communal kitchen. Complimentary water (dispenser) and premium coffee/tea is available 24/7 at the communal kitchen. Hob and Hood is available for some light cooking. Luggage lockers (own padlock) are available at the premise

name: Double Room, DAYUSE, 9 hours: 8AM-5PM

Just have a few hours in Singapore and need a place to recharge before going to the next destination, ST Signature Lite is the place you rely on to have a good shower, savour nice local food and park your luggage for a quick shopping nearby.

The space
The private cabin is equipped with one queen sized bed with no window, suitable for 2 adults and one small child. In room amenities include bathroom, towels, TV, safe, vanity area and writing table with chair.

name: full kitchen, petfriendly service apartment Town
description:
When you stay with us, you will stay right in the heart of downtown Singapore.

Cantonment Road is a historic icon.

Steps away from Central Business District, delicious local dining, chic cafes, galleries, shops and the iconic landmark – Tanjong Pagar railway station, Lim’s Ancestral Temple and Sri Manmatha Karunya Eswarar Temple.

A short distance to Sentosa Island.

Every apartment is bigger than average hotel rooms with private bathroom, in-room kitchen, refrigerator, washer and dryer.

The space
The unbeatable space and in-room amenities provide comfort and privacy, especially when work-from-home becomes the new normal.

In-room kitchen, washer and dryer makes your stay extra cost effective.

No co-living space - 100% privacy guaranteed.

Twice a week housekeeping.

Access to free WiFi.

description:
This amazing studio apartment is conveniently located on Singapore’s bustling Orchard Road, you can relax and unwind in this very spacious and fully-furnished unit.
You are also centrally locate which means that you are just a stone's throw away from various commercial spaces, MRTs and restaurants.

The space
The studio apartment is spread over an area of 44sqm or 470sqft and comes with a queen size bed, writing desk, wardrobe and bedside table with lamps.

The adjoining living area comes with a two seater sofa, a chair and a flat screen TV with local and international channels. A CD / DVD player / Hi-Fi system is also present at your disposal.

The kitchen is also well-equipped with a microwave, washer-dryer, cooking top, large refrigerator, electric kettle, rice cooker (upon request) and a toaster along with glassware, crockery, cutlery & utensils.

You also get twice-weekly housekeeping service (except Sundays & Public Holida

Our place is located off Orchard Road, Singapore's premier shopping belt. Staying here provides you with easy access to all the major Singapore attractions including the shopping districts, Central Business District (CBD) at Raffles Place, Marina Bay, Chinatown, Clarke Quay and the fun-filled island of Sentosa Singapore – which houses popular tourist attractions such as Universal Studios, Madame Tussauds, Marine Life Park and Adventure Cove Waterpark.

The space
Modern interior room decor with a cozy ambiance offers the comfort you need after a long day out exploring the city!

The studio comes with a queen sized-bed for 2 pax and is able to host up to 4 guests. Extra single mattress will be provided when booking is made for more than 2 guests.

The studio is air-conditioned and fully furnished with a Private Bathroom, Kitchenette, Washer/Dryer, 2 Sea

name: Airy and Beautiful one bedroom apartment
description:
Beautifully designed with modern furniture , perfect apartment for a family.
Just 5 minutes’ walk from the nearest MRT Station, the development is ideally located for people commuting to the CBD. It is also blessed with a wide range of wining and dining options a very short drive or train ride away. Pollen & Bleu itself consists of 106 units, housed in three 8 storey blocks.

Guest access
The nearest MRT station is Farrer Road on the Circle Line, a 5 minute walk away. From there you can get to both Holland Village and Botanic Gardens in just one stop in either direction. The former gives you plenty of dining and shopping options, while the latter not only has the UNESCO recognised gardens, but also gives you access to the Downtown Line. Commuters can get to the CBD from apartment in 25 minutes. By car, it is 5 minutes to Orchard Road, and 10 minutes into town, depending on traffic.
