Chartering a yacht during Chinese New Years for your staff or customers is an ideal way to thank them for their loyalty and hard work. We can organise champagne breakfasts, lunch cruises, or evening trips with dinner and fine wines, or cocktail parties and private parties. Can you think of a more unique, special and exclusive way to celebrate this special occasion?

It is less than 5 minutes walk away from Jalan Besar MRT station and 10-15 minutes walk from Rochor and Little India MRT stations. You can find the landmark of Sri Veeramakaliamman Temple embellished with colourful statues of Hindu deities in Little India, with graffiti art across a few streets.

The space

In room amenities include bathroom, TV, towels, safe, vanity area and writing table with chair.

It boasts a co-working space on level 3, outdoor hangout spaces on level 2, a meeting and laundry area at level 1. Being a co-living hotel, there are communal and shared spaces around the hotel for you to mingle with other guests. There are also a lot of dining options within walking distance around the hotel. name: Village Hotel Bugis - Family Room 10% Off BAR
description:
Be culturally charmed as you live in the melting pot of Arab, Peranakan and Indian cultures. Go on a shopping spree at nearby shopping malls or let yourself be captivated by the boutique outlets stocked with unique fashion labels as you explore the side streets of Kampong Glam, Bugis Village and Haji Lane. Being close to the heart of the city centre, the hotel offers views of the city’s skyscrapers and Singapore Flyer. With so much to explore, you will never have a dull moment during your stay.

Other things to note
Inspired by the colourful personality of its neighbourhood, each Village encounter is like no other. Step into any Village property and experience the locale's unique charm. Once outside, let Village be your guide as you soak in the sights and sounds of our vibrant precincts.
Be sure to download a copy of the Village Passport upon check-in, a specially curated walking guide to help you Eat, Play and Explore like a Local.

When you think of studio apartments, small compact places come to mind. But not this one! This is a big one, with plenty of space to move around. It even comes with a mini-attached lounge area. Ideally located near the central area, you are always easily accessible to the CBD and excellent MRT network.

The space
A studio apartment, like a grand bedroom fit for a king, this is covers a total area 420sqft.

Your sleeping area has a double bed with comfortable fittings to ensure that your sleep easy and get the rest you need.

Coming forward to the integrated lounge area, it features a sofas/sofa bed, coffee table and smart TV.

Also a big plus for long stayers is the addition of the kitchenette. Now you can dine in whenever you choose to and satiate your midnight cravings.

You also get, twice a week housekeeping, iron, ironing board and free Wi-Fi so you don't skip a beat of work and stay connected 24/7!

Gues

It also has a cute little library and record player and collection that the guests are welcome to use. description: Our tiny house next to Blk 81 Ayer Rajah Crescent is finally completed! The end result is amazing as the container seems to be invisible! This is possibly the one and only mirror shipping container hotel in the world!

The apartment features full condominium facilities with majestic Sky Roof Terraces, and unique landscaping and greenery.

The service apartments is extremely well-located. With Queenstown MRT Station at the doorstep, residents can expect utmost convenience to CBD, Orchard, One-North and the Future Greater Southern Waterfront areas.

The space
Residents can expect a plethora of options when it comes to shopping and dining. With Anchorpoint Mall, Queensway Shopping Center, Alexandra Central , IKEA, Alexandra Food Center, and ABC Brickworks Food Centre within walking distance, residents are spoilt for choices!

Guest access
I will not be available physically but will be available 24*7 at the Internet, Whats app and Airbnb

Other things to note
Only for residential purpose.
Security deposit of one month is required at the time of check in

name: Rental room near NTU - Jurong west st 81 SG 640840
description:
Rental rooms in Jurong West near NTU ( Nanyang Technological University)- SG 640840

2 Common rooms is available.

SGD$700 per month per person , including utilities bill. It will be $1300 per month if a person wishes to rental the whole common room.

- 5 Mins walk to Nanyang Technological University
- Bus stop is right below the blk
- Light cooking allowed
- Fans provided
- Free wifi provided

The space
Please note double decker beds will be placed into the rooms after renovation works are done. If requested, we will not place any beds in it.

- Fans will be provided. No Aircon. Shared washing machine, refrigerator, kitchen toilet with heater. Washing of laundry once a week
- Study corner and mini mart just beside the blk
- Suitable for couples/ students/ singles.
- Light cooking only, ie instant noodle, coffee and tea.
- Nice and clean environment
- No visitors not allowed<

name: Loft 1_Premium Loft Suite in CBD，5mins to MRT
description:
Located in the heart of Singapore, 36 Club St 069469, A.I.R. Residences offers a prime spot for exploring the city's premium shopping and entertainment district. 5 mins walking distance to Chinatown and Telok Ayer MRT.

The lively street filled with restaurants and night clubs. Few steps away from the CBD area that makes it extremely accessible to explore every attractions in the city.

A.I.R is a great accommodation choice for expatriate & travellers willing to experience the real local life.

The space
Our service apartment is a 5 storey protected heritage building located in The Central of the city. This Nyonya Baba building is full of Southeast Asian style. Each suite has bright windows with characteristic traditional shutter looking out to the lively bars and streets.
All suites come with a kitchen, you might want to explore the local market, grab the fresh and unique ingredients, preparing a romantic meal for your loved ones.
F

name: Walk to Mt.Elizabeth, Large 2BR-2Bath (80sqm)
description:
Merely a walk to Mount Elizabeth hospital and Novena MRT, this beautiful 2-bedroom space apt for 4 guests. With utilities and all amenities included, you are just 5-mins away from Bugis Shopping district and Orchard. Free Wi-Fi in public areas and parking available along with Gym, Pool, garden and barbecues are on-site.

The space
Spread across 80 sqm or 861 sqft, this is a fully-furnished 2-bedroom and 2-bathroom apartment featuring a separate living, dining space and a well -equipped kitchen.

You also get a private balcony which can be accessed from both the living room and one of the bedrooms.

One of the bedrooms is a master room with an ensuite bathroom and both the bedrooms come with a queen size bed.

The kitchen is also well-equipped and sufficient to sustain self-contained living.

Complimentary Wi-Fi access in rooms, Complimentary coffee, tea, bottled drinking water, Complimentary local call, Electronic safe, Wash

name: Master Room in 4 BR on Thomson Road, Novena
description:
This is a co-living setup in Novena. A master bedroom meaning that you will have a private bathroom all to your self. Besides the reduced rate, co-living has many other plus sides to it too! You'll get to make new connections plus be in a prime location for less than a traditional serviced apartment.

The space
This is a master bedroom in a 4 bedroom apartment in Novena. This is ideal for 2 adults as it comes with a king size bed and the bedding is fitted with comfortable linen. There is a big window that lets in plenty of natural light plus a study desk so that you can get your work done conveniently. The built in 4 doors wardrobe is also spacious.

The rest of the apartment is shared with other co-inhabitants. The comfy living room has a sofa and coffee table. Whilst the dining room is just adjoining to it and can seat up to 4 people.

name: Functional Studio Apartment in Vibrant Chinatown
description:
This is your stay solution in Singapore for every type of traveler. Whether you are an expat or a leisure traveler these will suit your needs and more! Fully-furnished and serviced, you can relax and focus your attention on the more important aspects of your travel. The fantastic location makes for a nice day out with plenty of explore and eat.

The space
This apartment measures 25 sqm or 269sqft in size and can comfortably accommodate 2 guests. The comfy queen size bed ensures that you get a good rest every time you lay on it.

You also get various facilities and amenities in your apartment that make your stay complete. Flat screen TV with cable channels, in-room electronic safe, steam iron & ironing board and dining table that can double up as a desk. The floor to ceiling glass windows also lets in plenty of natural light.

You also get a kitchen and you can make full use of the microwave, mini-refrigerator, electric kettle, glassware, crock

name: Sentosa Michael Hotel Singapore 1 King bed
description:
About This Space
Hotel Michael is designed with the style of a gallery for art lovers where rooms are decorated with mural-adorned walls and artistic furnishings. The hotel is the closest hotel to Universal Studios Sentosa, getting you steps away from South East Asia’s biggest theme park.
You’ll love the stylish decor of this charming place to stay.
We offer you 1 King bed or 2 Single beds with 1 private bathroom.

Other things to note

name: Lovely Studio Room In Chinatown
description:
A studio room for those who are looking for an upscale accommodation in the vibrant neighborhood of Chinatown. This is fully furnished and serviced so your needs are taken care of. Apart from the room, you also get to access the many facilities in the property such as a gym and swimming pool.

The space
The studio room is spread over an area of 237 sqft and comes with a queen size bed. The floor to ceiling windows provide a great view of the city that will just make you want to spend your day exploring the city.

In the room, you also get a multi-purpose desk that you can use as a dining table, work desk and make-up desk.

You also get a coffee & tea making facilities, electric kettle, mini refrigerator, rice cooker (upon request) and water heater.

The bathroom has eco-friendly bath amenities with hair dryers and towels. It has a separate shower area too.

For your convenience, you get free Wi-Fi, an electronic safe, iron a

name: Tropical Resort Oasis with pool and gym
description:
This stylish resort standalone house furnished to the highest standard, is perfect for a family or group trips. Situated in a cul de sac adjacent to a nature reserve and full of greenery and mature plants. Nearest MRT rapid train is 10min walk. Close to a large supermarket and plenty of eateries- local hawkers and restaurants, all within walking distance.

The space
Spacious house with 4800sf of indoor living space, is right in the heart of nature. Cool, airy, bright with relaxing garden, outdoor patio and pool. Basement gym available to use.

Guest access
No access to bedroom 5(not pictured) and storeroom. One bedroom will be locked for owner’s personal belongings. Room 6 which is a Basement gym is available to use.

Other things to note
Home cleaning services are available weekly if needed. Separate prices will apply, please check with host.

Apart from the accommodation, you can also access the property's facilities including the large swimming pool and gymnasium to keep yourself fit.

The living room features a sofa, coffee table and TV with cable. Whilst the adjoining dining room has a seating capacity for 4.

name: Queenstown 2BR w/ spa, pool & tennis, nr mrt
description:
Show up and start living from day one in Singapore with this stylish two-bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped Queenstown home with stunning balcony views over the city. (#SGP3)

The space
Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this two-bedroom apartment. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. Amenities

name: 新加坡的滨海湾金沙酒店（Marina Bay Sands Hotel ）耗资高达40亿英镑打造，
description:
新加坡金沙酒店（Marina Bay Sands ）因壮观的空中无边泳池和绝美的空中花园而闻名世界，是世上最昂贵酒店，也是新加坡最大的酒店。这座酒店堪称有史以来设计最为复杂的酒店，不仅涵盖了多种业态，而且拥有多项世界之最以及新加坡最与众不同的城市观景方式。无数游客来到这里，在享受奢华与尊贵的酒店服务之外，都会前往空中观景台一览新加坡的天际线，从另一角度感受不一样的狮城美景。对于喜爱购物和美食的游客来说，这里更有无数的精品店铺和全球获奖的餐厅，带给人们非凡的假日享受。

Great for business and leisure travellers looking for a central location! The area is popular and bustling with many restaurants and bars, guests may experience some street noise.

name: City 2-Singles Private Room, Shared Toilet
description:
Family-run hostel: Clean, comfortable and homely accommodation. Private partitioned room with sharing toilet, lounge and pantry area. Partitioned walls with folding doors & communal air-con.

Near city, direct green line MRT train station to Changi Airport.
5 - 10 minutes walking distance to 3 MRT stations i.e. Lavender/Bendemeer/Farrer Park MRT.

You Tube video, search: "DRMaemeuP1U".
YOUKU: search “Blanc Inn Singapore"

The space
Our space is approximately 100 sq ft. There are two types of layout assigned randomly to guests upon arrival. Type 1 is furnished with 3 Singapore-sized single beds. Type 2 is furnished with 1 Singapore-sized Queen bed and 1 single bed. Maximum number of guests allowed for this listing is 2 pax. There are lockable cabinets and safe box for the safekeeping of your belongings.

Facilities:
- Common Toilets
- Communal Lounge/ Pantry.
- Air-con available
- Laundry Services (24

name: 新加坡金沙酒店（Marina Bay Sands ）因壮观的空中无边泳池和绝美的空中花园而闻名世界
description:
新加坡金沙酒店（Marina Bay Sands ）因壮观的空中无边泳池和绝美的空中花园而闻名世界，是世上最昂贵酒店，也是新加坡最大的酒店。这座酒店堪称有史以来设计最为复杂的酒店，不仅涵盖了多种业态，而且拥有多项世界之最以及新加坡最与众不同的城市观景方式。无数游客来到这里，在享受奢华与尊贵的酒店服务之外，都会前往空中观景台一览新加坡的天际线，从另一角度感受不一样的狮城美景。对于喜爱购物和美食的游客来说，这里更有无数的精品店铺和全球获奖的餐厅，带给人们非凡的假日享受。

name: Marina Bay 2BR w/ pool & tennis, nr Downtown mrt
description:
Show up and start living from day one in Singapore with this exquisite two-bedroom Blueground apartment. You’ll love coming home to this thoughtfully furnished, beautifully designed, and fully-equipped Marina Bay home with stunning high floor views over the city. (ID #SGP5)

The space
Gorgeous furniture, fully-equipped kitchen, smart TV, and a premium wireless speaker are just a few of the amenities you’ll find inside this two-bedroom apartment. Ideally located in Singapore, you’ll find a lot to love outside as well. When you’re ready to relax, you’ll be happy to discover every Blueground bedroom comes with superior quality mattresses, luxury linens, and cozy towels. We handle everything so you can simply show up and start living. This apartment also offers in-apartment laundry.



Building amenities unique to this two-bedroom include an on-site:

- Indoor/outdoor pool
- Gym
- Washer/Dryer in-apartment
- 24-hou

description:

The space
This 43 sqm or 462 sqft studio apartment includes the bed, living area, kitchen, bathroom and the private balcony.

The living area includes the sofa, coffee table, television and the dining table and chair. Your open concept kitchen is right across and is fully furnished with facilities such as stove, refrigerator, utensils and sink. You will also have a washer in the apartment.

The living area also includes your comfortable bed where you can rest and relax after a long day.

Your bathroom has all the basic facilities such as hand shower, sink, W.C. and make up mirror.

Other facilities include high speed internet and air conditioning.

name: 全世界最美的无边游泳池（Marina Bay Sands MBS）
description:
新加坡金沙酒店（Marina Bay Sands ）因壮观的空中无边泳池和绝美的空中花园而闻名世界，是世上最昂贵酒店，也是新加坡最大的酒店。这座酒店堪称有史以来设计最为复杂的酒店，不仅涵盖了多种业态，而且拥有多项世界之最以及新加坡最与众不同的城市观景方式。无数游客来到这里，在享受奢华与尊贵的酒店服务之外，都会前往空中观景台一览新加坡的天际线，从另一角度感受不一样的狮城美景。对于喜爱购物和美食的游客来说，这里更有无数的精品店铺和全球获奖的餐厅，带给人们非凡的假日享受。
　　金沙酒店位于海湾舫道10号，由三座连成一串的酒店大楼组成，顶部建有空中花园。酒店

Other things to note
关于入住酒店的任何问题 、都跟我联系
